inclusion.criterion: UC known and diagnosed by established clinical-endoscopic and histological criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has not been on oral systemic corticosteroids more than 14 days prior to hospitalization
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy / unable to take prednisone / hydrocortisone/ 5-ASA
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Pt is a 22yo F otherwise healthy with a 5 yr history of the systemic mastocytosis, with flares normally 3/year, presenting with flushing and tachycardia concerning for another flare.
